Residential-ITC-UClub Shuttle

Description:

The RI Shuttle travels around campus making stops at Susquehanna and Hillside, Mohawk, Newing, the East and West Gyms, Clearview, and Hinman / Academic A, while also traveling off-campus making stops at the Innovative Tech Complex (ITC), UClub / University Plaza, Meadows, Hayes, and Washington Dr & Lehigh Av.

Operation Time:

The RI Shuttle runs in continuous scheduled loops on Green Buses all-day on Weekdays in the Summer only.

Notes:

Scroll below for a graphic map of this route, its schedule, and its stops with links to stop pictures and Google Maps location pins so that you can easily find your stop, and know when your bus is expected to arrive.

① Leaves Union

② Hillside

③ Mohawk

④ ITC

⑤ UClub / University Plaza

⑥ Returns to Binghamton University

① ② ③ ④ ⑤ ⑥

On summer weekends the Residential-ITC-UClub does not run.


For service to UClub, Meadows, and Hayes, please use the UClub Shuttle.
